description:
Del Bigtree, host of the popular HighWire alternative-health news show, interviews Dr. Andrew Kaufman, who- like many other doctors & scientists are saying- says no one has ever used standard scientific methods to prove that a novel virus, known as SARS-CoV-2, even exists, and that, even if it does exist, there is no proof that it is responsible for the illnesses and deaths attributed to it. 

These concepts might sound foreign if you rely on the corporate pharma cartel mainstream
media for your information, and if you’ve never heard of the “Terrain Theory” of disease.

The Rockefeller-funded Allopathic medical system only teaches & subscribes to the “Germ Theory”, which is just a theory & not factual, and in the case of Covid19, is based on fraudulent, ineffective & inapplicable testing methods.

Once you hear what Dr. Kaufman has to say, you will be amazed at the evidence to support the Terrain Theory of disease. 

If true, all the lockdowns and masks and social distancing and ventilators and loss of employment and crushing of economies is totally unnecessary. 

Del Bigtree asks: If viruses are not the cause of illnesses, then why are they planning to force an anti-viral (DNA- modifying) vaccine on everyone? 

Please listen carefully to Dr. Kaufman’s response to that question.
